name: Xcode Color Theme File
summary: Learn about .DVTCOLORTHEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In order to select your theme, you must place your DVTCOLORTHEME file in the ~/​Library/​Developer/​Xcode/​UserData/​FontandColorThemes directory. If the "FontandColorThemes" folder doesn't exist yet, simply create that folder and restart Xcode. Then, you can select your color theme in the application. Select Xcode → Preferences..., choose "Fonts & Colors, and select your theme.
NOTE: In Xcode 4, DVTCOLORTHEME files replaced .XCCOLORTHEME files.

description: Color theme file used by Apple Xcode, an iOS and Mac OS X application development program; structured similar to a .PLIST file, formatted in XML; contains data that describes the color theme of the code editor; includes text color, text font, and text background color.
